forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High near 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low -7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low 21F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers developing during the afternoon. High 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers developing during the afternoon. High 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low -8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low around 20F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 20-30cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low around 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low -3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low 28F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then some snow showers later at night. Low -1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies with a mixture of rain and snow developing overnight. Low 32F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low near 0C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will mix with rain at times overnight. Low near 35F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low -4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain mixing with and changing to snow late. Low 27F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 18F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to partly cloudy conditions during the afternoon. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to partly cloudy conditions during the afternoon. High 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 22F. Winds light and variable.
